messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

confluence upgrade has broken the search on confluence sent wednesday july re notification confluence version upgrade update hi case one reported yet believe confluence upgrade broken search confluence below what get when trying search confluence kind regards manager en sent july notification confluence version upgrade update importance high confluence version upgrade dear colleagues upgrade confluence application version completed successfully what version allow users delete their own content space administrator you can allow delete their own content pages attachments space reports communicate information easy reports dashboard but you know less spent trying find you worked yesterday or even earlier means more spent getting done hopefully finish copy hierarchies you can copy child pages one easy process lets you duplicate existing content or take snapshot important pages better way restrict pages easier restrict can view your pages confluence improvements for audio video files multimedia macro uses tags supported by modern browsers without losing your place more losing your spot big also tools you need always your fingertips data restrictions attachments tools appear you start scroll up meaning scrolling way top automatically watched by if add even with watch setting disabled be informed about any updates made space you working you can also find more detailed information about updates mentioned above here if you have any please hesitate contact best regards ext hub
